channel.title: Life on Shweata's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Shweata's Blog

item.title: I'm a Young India Fellow 2025
item.description: Yay! I got selected for the Young India Fellowship (YIF) 2025. Taking a gap year after undergrad was risky, but I’m happy that it led me to the YIF. In a month’s time, I will be back to being a student. Probably for the first time, my education will be worthy of time and investment. What sold YIF for me is an that it’s all-in-one package. I’m learning history, economics, statistics, astrophysics, climate, leadership, writing, and many other disciplines and skills.
